title: Quick Take: VP Debate Preview
description: What to watch for in Tuesday night's Vice Presidential debate. This episode: host/white house correspondent Tamara Keith, congressional correspondent Susan Davis, and political editor Domenico Montanaro. More coverage at nprpolitics.org. Email the show at nprpolitics@npr.org.
